mapper.select: select clause_id from enjoy e, clause_enjoy ce where e.id = #{id} and e.id = ce.enjoy_id

select clause_text, enjoy, title, textID, mode, policyClassification, type, taxType, date, notice.N_id, C_id from enjoy, clause_enjoy, clause, notice where name = #{name} and enjoy.id = clause_enjoy.enjoy_id and clause_enjoy.clause_id = clause.C_id and clause.N_id = notice.N_id
